actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To require the Secretary of Education to waive certain regulations in considering an application submitted by the Winona R-III School District, Missouri.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education to waive certain requirements for local effort in excess of $200,000 in awarding funds to the Winona R-III School District, Missouri, under Federal law relating to impact aid.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Education to waive certain regulations in considering an application submitted by the Winona R-III School District, Missouri.
